# vertexAdditionalBinaryFunctions

**Instance Property**

Provides an array of binary functions representing additional binary vertex shader functions.

## Declaration

```swift
var vertexAdditionalBinaryFunctions: [any MTL4BinaryFunction]? { get set }
```
